subject: Why clone in TestResult class
msgSnippet: Hi group, I m studying on the source codes of Junit.When i look into the TestResult class, there is a clone operation called  cloneListeners in the
messageBody:
Hi group,

I'm studying on the source codes of Junit.When i look into the TestResult class,
there is a clone operation called cloneListeners in the addError,addFailure method,
I'm puzzled at this, why the listeners need be cloned and fFailures and fErrors no need to be cloned.
Can anyone give some hints on this?

Thanks!

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
